titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1964) to authorize appropriations for the Maritime Administration for fiscal year 1994, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-196, by Mr. Bonior.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 1964 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Bill is open to amendments. It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries now printed in the bill. Points of order against the substitute for failure to comply with clause 5(a) of rule XXI shall be waived. It shall be in order to consider the en bloc amendments printed in the report accompanying this resolution, and points of order against the amendments for failure to comply with clause 7 of rule XVI shall be waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 74.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/28/1993--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1964 (Maritime Administration authorization).
